pairs.insult: Your calendar discipline is as empty as that meeting room.
retorts: Then book it now—so you’ll learn punctuality there.

pairs.insult: You manage blockers like a traffic cone in a storm.
retorts: Yet I still keep the lanes clear—watch me move you along.

pairs.insult: Your slides have more fluff than content.
retorts: Perfect—then there’s room for your defeat as the main point.

pairs.insult: You negotiate like a muted mic on a video call.
retorts: Funny, everyone will still hear me win this room.
